name: Scrap Defense
description:
Get your friends together and build up your defenses against hordes of robots in this simple sandbox tower defense game!

-Play Multiplayer or Solo

-Destroy robots to get Scrap, which can be used to build structures to defend your base.

-Place walls, watchtowers, houses and turrets to protect the Gem!

My Website : http://dezboyle.com/

Email : dezboyledev@gmail.com

Disclaimer: This game is not a huge professional endevour and this does not represent my potential as a game developer.  I just made this as a fun (and very frustrating) project to learn the ropes of multiplayer game dev.
